alert.note: Alert for Brown (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:41PM CDT until May 12 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Brown County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 641 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Powhattan, moving northeast at 30 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was located near Morrill, and was also moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hiawatha, Horton, Fairview, Robinson, Morrill, Reserve, Powhattan, Hamlin, Willis and Kickapoo Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
